text: I love this game and its amazing soundtrack!
author: Doctor Nog

text: Once I realized this game was probably something special after looking at the reviews and user impressions, I decided to quickly buy it and play through it before any kind of major spoilers reached me. Unfortunately, I did hear about some of the game's major mechanics before getting into it and wish I hadn't, but even then the whole experience was special, surprising and full of emotions. I really recommend doing the same and playing it before reading anything about it, don't let the graphics and the "RPG" gameplay pull you away. The soundtrack is currently my favorite of the year so we'll definitely see more of this game in the list. Let's just say I played through the game 3 times and the 3rd time was very difficult in different ways. I could write a lot more about this game and why it's so good, but it's really something that should be experienced. I'll talk about it again when it surely gets its entry in my Top 10 of the year.
author: SupraDarky

text: +SupraDarky The reason you stated about hearing some of the spoilers, or even the minor spoilers such as gameplay and some of the jokes, is why I avoid most things related to Undertale and ... well, I got very good at getting a glazed eye look the moment anything resembling Undertale appears on my screen, lol.  In fact, the only reason I'm clicking on this video is because I got past this boss and know who it is now XD  I'm not surprised you like the OST, though!  It was definitely a stand out and reminds me of some of the old greats in JRPG.
